subtitleNullable: Country Ranking Based on Media Press Freedom Index
descriptionNullable:
### **Overview**
The World Press Freedom Index assesses the state of journalism in 180 countries and territories, highlights the disastrous effects of news and information chaos – the effects of a globalised and unregulated online information space that encourages fake news and propaganda. Press Freedom is the fundamental principle that communication and expression through various media, including printed and electronic media, especially published materials, should be considered a right to be exercised freely

### **Original Source**
The data collected from this [link](https://rsf.org/en) on July 2022

### **Data**
This dataset consists of 3 reports from 2020 to 2020. Each file contains country ranking, score, and reported press abuses.

Note:
- Assessment metrics for 2022 are different from 2020 and 2021
- The total abuse to press (Journalist and Media workers) is reported or exposed cases
title: Press Freedom Index and Abuse 2020-2022
